item.title: ABV Emails Retrieval
item.description: Abstract So for several years now, I’ve been fed up with the email provider that I’ve been using. I choose it - or there it was chosen for me by my dad - in my most early internet days. Because of its early inception, the email has accumulated an enormous amount of emails over the years. Currently, I have around 7000 emails. Yes, the majority of them are useless spam but I really don’t want to go over all of them and clean them up.
